item.title: General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)
item.description: Effective date: January 4, 2021 Responsible person Michael Sasser Gasoline ring 56 67657 Kaiserslautern Germany Email address: Michael@MichaelSasser.org Imprint: https://michaelsasser.github.io/matrix-room-python/imprint-gdpr/imprint/ Overview of data processing The following overview summarizes the types of data processed and the purposes of their processing and refers to the data subjects. Types of data processed Inventory data (e.g. names, addresses). Content data (e.g. entries in online forms). Contact details (e.g. email, phone numbers). Meta / communication data (e.
